title: Sausage quiche with red onion marmalade
ingredients: ['For the marmalade', '1 tablespoon sunflower oil', '1 heaped tablespoon chunky orange marmalade', '2 red onions, finely sliced', 'salt and pepper, to taste', 'For the quiche', '1 packet ready-made shortcrust pastry', '6 thick pork sausages', '60g fresh breadcrumbs', '2 tablespoons double cream', '1 heaped teaspoon mustard powder', '2 large eggs']
